AdultRole.Description: The role to transform into after a provided growth range

ChildToAdultTimeRange.Description: The time range within which the role should transform into its AdultRole if provided.

FeedTimeout.Description: The timeout between possible feed events

IsDomesticable.Description: Indication that the animal can be domesticated.

IsBreedable.Description: Indication that the animal can breed with others of its type.

WanderRadius.Description: The wander radius of the NPC.

ViewRange.Description: The view distance of the NPC, in blocks.

ViewSector.Description: The view sector of the NPC, in degrees.

HearingRange.Description: The hearing distance of the NPC, in blocks.

AbsoluteDetectionRange.Description: The range at which a target is guaranteed to be detected, in blocks. If set to zero, absolute detection will be disabled. The interval [ AbsoluteDetectionRange, AlertedActionRange ] defines the distance range within which an NPC can be befriended.

AlertedRange.Description: The range within which the target can be seen/sensed when the NPC is alerted to their presence, in blocks. Should be higher than sense ranges.

AlertedActionRange.Description: The range at which an NPC will react to other NPCs and players, depending on the attitude towards them, in blocks. Should be higher than AbsoluteDetectionRange to make the NPC befriendable.

LeashDistance.Description: The range at which an NPC will start to want to return to their spawn point, in blocks.

AttractiveItems.Description: The list of items that are deemed attractive (there's a chance targets holding them will be followed).

LovedItems.Description: The list of items that are deemed very attractive (it's guaranteed targets holding them will be followed and befriended).

AttractiveItemsTimeout.Description: The maximum timeout after which the NPC will lose interest in attractive times, regardless of range to the target, in seconds.

AttractiveItemsSmellTimeout.Description: The timeout after which the NPC will lose interest in attractive times, when near the target, in seconds

FlockArray.Description: The set of NPCs belonging to this flock type

ClimbHeight.Description: The maximum climb height, in blocks.

AttitudeGroup.Description: The attitude group this NPC belongs to.

PlayerDefaultAttitude.Description: The default attitude towards the player.

AlertedTimeoutReaction.Description: The timeout after which an alerted NPC will make a decision on whether to befriend the target, in seconds.

AlertedTimeoutGiveUp.Description: The timeout after which an alerted NPC will give up on the target, in seconds.

GrazingBlockSet.Description: The type of block that this NPC will graze on top of.

FoodBlockSet.Description: The type of block that this NPC will occasionally seek out to munch on.

FoodItemSet.Description: The list of dropped items that this NPC will occasionally seek out to munch on.

DayTimePeriod.Description: The hour range considered to be daytime for this NPC (inclusive). Hours should be written with decimal fractions.

DayTimeNapWeight.Description: The weight used to determine if the NPC should have a short nap during the day. Set to 0 to disable.

DayTimeNapTimeRange.Description: The duration range of daytime naps, in seconds.

DayFlavorAnimation.Description: The flavor animation to play during the day. Ignored if null or empty.

GreetAnimation.Description: The flavor animation to play when greeting another NPC or player. Ignored if null or empty.

ChanceToTurnFriendly.Description: The chance that the NPC will befriend the target when in the alerted state.

ChanceToTurnFriendlyWithAttractiveItem.Description: The chance that the NPC will befriend the target, if the latter is holding an attractive item.

FriendlyOverrideTime.Description: The duration of the friendly attitude override for the target, in seconds.

FriendlyOverrideTimeWithAttractiveItem.Description: The duration of the friendly attitude override for the target, when the latter is holding an attractive item, in seconds.

IgnoreOverrideTime.Description: The duration of the ignore attitude override for the target.

WeightGreet.Description: The chance that the NPC will greet a friendly target.

WeightFollowItem.Description: The chance that the NPC will follow a friendly target holding an attractive item.

WeightFollow.Description: The chance that the NPC will follow friendly NPCs or players at a distance.

WeightIgnore.Description: The chance that the NPC will ignore friendly NPCs of players.

IsHarvestable.Description: Whether this NPC can be 'harvested'. This includes shearing, milking, etc.

HarvestInteractionContext.Description: The interaction context of the harvest tool. If empty, no tool is needed to harvest the NPC.

HarvestRequiredAttitudes.Description: The attitude groups of players that can harvest the NPC.

HarvestDropList.Description: The drop list that's executed when the NPC is harvested.

HarvestParticles.Description: The particle system that is spawned when the NPC is harvested.

HarvestSound.Description: The sound that plays when NPC is harvested.

HarvestTimeout.Description: The minimum time between consecutive harvests. Expressed in the ISO-8601 time period notation, where both values of the array must have the same prefix (either 'PT' or 'P').

HarvestModelSlot.Description: The model attachment slot where the 'harvested' state is displayed.

HarvestModelAttachmentHarvestable.Description: The attachment that should be rendered when the NPC can be harvested.

HarvestModelAttachmentHarvested.Description: The attachment that should be rendered when the NPC was harvested and is in timeout.

HarvestAddItemBucket.Description: Item to add when player holds Container_Bucket (e.g., milk bucket for milking).

HarvestAddItemDecoBucket.Description: Item to add when player holds Deco_Bucket (e.g., milk bucket for milking).

ProduceItem.Description: The item this NPC produces (poop, eggs, etc).

DayFlavorAnimationLength.Description: How long the daytime flavor animation will be played for, in seconds.

Timid.Description: Whether this NPC is timid or not. Timid NPCs are harder to approach and befriend.

AttackWhenStartled.Description: Whether this NPC attacks when startled.

Attack.Description: The attack interaction this NPC will use.

AttackRange.Description: The range at which the NPC can identify an attacker.

MaxSpeed.Description: The maximum walking speed of the NPC.

MaxHealth.Description: The maximum health of the NPC.

MaxRotationSpeed.Description: The maximum rotation speed, in degrees per second.

RunThreshold.Description: The speed ratio at which the NPC switches to run animation (e.g if MaxSpeed is 10, and RunThreshold is set to 0.55, the NPC will start running at speed 5.5).

IsMemory.Description: Whether the NPC is a memory.

MemoriesNameOverride.Description: If set, overrides the memory name.

IsMountable.Description: Whether this NPC can be mounted.

BreathesInWater.Description: Whether this NPC can breathe underwater.

NameTranslationKey.Description: The translation key for the NPC name display

Interactions.$Comment: Config for a successful melee hit, default values for Effects and HitShape are not overwritten here, see each NPC_ file
